options.name: Quick Add
options.description: Quick add a task using natural language

properties.name: project
properties.description: The destination project. Choose from the list, or specify an ID.

properties.name: section
properties.description: Section to which you want move the task. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: options
properties.description: The destination section. The task becomes the last root task of the section. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: section
options.description: The destination section. The task becomes the last root task of the section. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: parent
options.description: The destination parent task. The task becomes the last child task of the parent task. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: labels
properties.description: Optional labels that will be assigned to a created task. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

properties.name: text
properties.description: Natural language text for quick adding task (e.g., "Buy milk @Grocery #shopping tomorrow"). It can include a due date in free form text, a project name starting with the "#" character (without spaces), a label starting with the "@" character, an assignee starting with the "+" character, a priority (e.g., p1), a deadline between "{}" (e.g. {in 3 days}), or a description starting from "//" until the end of the text.

options.name: reminder
options.description: The date of the reminder, added in free form text

options.name: auto_reminder
options.description: When this option is enabled, the default reminder will be added to the new item if it has a due date with time set

options.name: dueDateTime
options.description: Specific date and time in RFC3339 format in UTC

options.name: dueLang
options.description: 2-letter code specifying language in case due_string is not written in English

options.name: dueString
options.description: Human defined task due date (ex.: “next Monday”, “Tomorrow”). Value is set using local (not UTC) time.

options.name: parentId
options.description: The parent task you want to operate on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: section
options.description: The section you want to operate on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: order
options.description: Non-zero integer used to sort tasks under the same parent

options.name: duration
options.description: Positive integer for task duration (must be used with Duration Unit)

options.name: durationUnit
options.description: Unit of time for duration (must be used with Duration)

options.name: deadlineDate
options.description: Specific deadline date in YYYY-MM-DD format

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return
